languages.text: Судя по оплавленным следам на броне, этот могучий танк, украшенный эмблемой фон Валанциус, побывал не в одном бою с врагами Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Судя по оплавленным следам на броне, этот могучий "Леман Расс" побывал не в одном бою.

languages.text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Судя по оплавленным следам на броне, этот могучий танк, украшенный эмблемой фон Валанциус, побывал не в одном бою с врагами Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armor, this mighty Leman Russ has seen a number of battles.
Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius crest, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.
Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius crest, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.
Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius crest, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.
Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の紋章で装飾された鎧の溶解痕から、この屈強なレマン・ラスは、自由開拓者の敵と歴戦の戦いを繰り広げてきたことが分かる。
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の紋章で装飾された鎧の溶解痕から、この屈強なレマン・ラスは、自由開拓者の敵と歴戦の戦いを繰り広げてきたことが分かる。

languages.text: 从装甲上融化的区域来看，这辆饰有冯·瓦兰修斯王朝盾徽的黎曼·鲁斯坦克曾多次与行商浪人的敌人作战。
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 从装甲上融化的区域来看，这辆饰有冯·瓦兰修斯王朝盾徽的黎曼·鲁斯坦克曾多次与行商浪人的敌人作战。

languages.text: A juzgar por las zonas fundidas de su blindaje, este poderoso Leman Russ, decorado con el escudo de los von Valancius, ha luchado en numerosas batallas contra los enemigos de la dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes.
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por las zonas fundidas de su blindaje, este poderoso Leman Russ, decorado con el escudo de los von Valancius, ha luchado en numerosas batallas contra los enemigos de la dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes.

languages.text: Décoré des armoiries de la dynastie von Valancius, le blindage du Leman Russ porte les stigmates de nombreuses batailles menées contre les ennemis {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Décoré des armoiries de la dynastie von Valancius, le blindage du Leman Russ porte les stigmates de nombreuses batailles menées contre les ennemis {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Den geschmolzenen Stellen auf seiner Panzerung nach zu schließen, hat dieser mächtige Leman Russ, der das Wappen derer von Valancius führt, zahlreiche Schlachten gegen die Feinde {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geschlagen.
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Den geschmolzenen Stellen auf seiner Panzerung nach zu schließen, hat dieser mächtige Leman Russ, der das Wappen derer von Valancius führt, zahlreiche Schlachten gegen die Feinde {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geschlagen.

languages.text: Zırhının erimiş noktalarına bakılırsa von Valancius armasıyla bezenmiş bu muazzam Leman Russ, pek çok çatışmada Hür Tacir'in düşmanlarıyla karşı karşıya gelmiş olmalı.
languages.original_text: Judging by the melted spots on its armour, this mighty Leman Russ, decorated with the von Valancius coat of arms, has fought in a number of battles against the enemies of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Zırhının erimiş noktalarına bakılırsa, von Valancius armasıyla bezenmiş bu muazzam Leman Russ, Hür Tacir'in düşmanlarına karşı pek çok çatışmada savaşmış olmalı.
